review: It was everything it would be. Easy set-up and begin to watch movies and use the apps.
author: Marchaunt Roberts

review: I enjoy the fire stick, but am a Comcast customer and AM VERY UPSET that HBOGO does not work.  The other features are very good though and you cannot beat the price.
author: PRERIC

review: not much to say. First time trying I purchased an episode of a tv show, it defaults to one click buy (what a rip off)poor network reception.NO ethernet port.overall a 2 is kind
author: J. stalnaker

review: These things are simply an amazing piece of merchandise for the price.  Can't get over how cheap they are.  We cut the cord after being sick of paying through the nose for cable/intenet/phone and this allows us to basically cut our price 2/3.  We may never go back and do not miss it near as much as we thought we would.  Very stable. Amazon did a very nice job with this gadget.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Awesome. I've now made my ten year old Bravia a Smart TV. Picture is still amazing so no need to upgrade. Saved several thousands from just this stick.Picture quality is excellent although my model is only 720p. Lots of quality apps to enhance viewing entertainment. Highly recommended.
author: GARRIGA
